response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to sell it to you for $9,500. This price reflects the value it holds for both of us while allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
